QuestData.Title: Coreforged Sigil of Skaldrenox
QuestData.Description: The sigils of the Abyssal High Council are crafted from the distilled essence of the element of their holder. This sigil was forged in flame.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Coreforged Sigil of Skaldrenox to Field Marshal Snowfall in Silithus.
